sentence: The image is an infographic titled "Life of an Hourlie," which illustrates details about Hourlies, including their creation and popularity.
sentence_cn: 该图是一张名为“小时工的生活”的信息图，其中展示了小时工的详细信息，包括其创作和受欢迎程度。

sentence: - Visual Elements:
- Cartoon-style graphics including elements like an airplane, parachutes, a building with floors, conveyor belts, and various vehicles.
sentence_cn: - 卡通风格的图形，包括飞机、降落伞、有地板的建筑物、传送带和各种车辆等元素。

sentence: - A large central house with multiple floors where Hourlies are produced and managed.
sentence_cn: - 一栋拥有多层的大型中央房屋，用于生产和管理小时工。

sentence: - Textual Elements:
- Top Section:
- "85% of sellers are based in the UK & US."
words: 85% of sellers are based in the UK & US.

sentence: - "A new Hourlie is created every 8 minutes."
sentence_cn: - “每 8 分钟就会创建一个新的 Hourlie。”
words: A new Hourlie is created every 8 minutes.

sentence: - "On average, each Hourlie is 3.5 hours long."
sentence_cn: - “平均而言，每个 Hourlie 的时长为 3.5 小时。”
words: On average, each Hourlie is 3.5 hours long.

sentence: - "Nearly 25% of Hourlies are in the design category ¨C it¡¯s all about the portfolio!"
sentence_cn: - “近 25% 的 Hourlies 属于设计类别 — 一切都与作品集有关！”
words: Nearly 25% of Hourlies are in the design category ¨C it¡¯s all about the portfolio!

sentence: - Middle Section:
- "Hourlie Delivery" with an illustration showing Hourlies being delivered via parachute.
sentence_cn: - “Hourlie Delivery” 的插图展示了 Hourlie 通过降落伞运送的过程。

sentence: - Below the building: "60% of Hourlies sold, sell more than once."
sentence_cn: - 建筑物下方：“60% 的小时工已售出，可多次出售。”
words: 60% of Hourlies sold, sell more than once.

sentence: - Bottom Section:
- "What Hourlies Are Popular" with a chart showing popularity.
sentence_cn: - “哪些小时最受欢迎”，并配有显示受欢迎程度的图表。

sentence: - Design: 24%
- Web Development: 13%
- Creative Arts: 7%
- Social Media: 10%
- Writing: 10%
- Marketing & PR: 6%
- Design Style:
- Uses a playful and cartoonish style with bright orange and blue colors.
sentence_cn: - 采用俏皮的卡通风格，配以明亮的橙色和蓝色。

sentence: - Includes various dotted paths and arrows to show movement and flow.
sentence_cn: - 包括各种虚线路径和箭头来显示运动和流动。

sentence: - Branding:
- The website "peopleperhour.com" is mentioned, indicating the source and possibly promoting the platform related to Hourlies.
sentence_cn: - 提到了“peopleperhour.com”网站，表明了来源并可能推广与 Hourlies 相关的平台。

sentence: This infographic provides a visual representation of how Hourlies are created, their duration, geographical origins, and the categories they fall into.
sentence_cn: 此信息图直观地展示了小时表的创建方式、持续时间、地理来源以及所属类别。
